name: H. Upmann (Non Cuban) - 1844 Classic - Robusto
additionalNotes:
H . Upmann cigars crafted by Altadis U.S.A. These top-selling Dominican handmade cigars were born out of Havana, Cuba in 1844 by brothers August and Hermann Upmann. The legend of this brand is strong, with some attributing the original owners with the invention of the cedar box as the preferred storage 
The rich, dark creations honoring their Cuban heritage are known for being smooth and flavorful, and over the years H Upmann continues to add many new brands to their extensive portfolio offering cigar enthusiasts a plethora of choices in strength and flavor while staying true to their original cigar that brought them their fame.
